text: Mike Wazowski is a character from both Monsters Inc. and Monsters University. In Monsters Inc. he and his partner Sulley worked as scorers on the scarefloor. He also had a girlfriend named Celia who was the receptionist. In Monsters University, he went on a school field trip with Ms. Graves kindergarten class to Monsters Inc. After visiting the factory, he wanted to be a scarer, so he went to Monsters University to accomplish this goal. Category:Monsters, Inc.
title: Mike Wazowski
